summary: Agentic economy narrative consolidates with major earnings, climate summitry, and severe storms in Asia.

events.details: Blue Origin sticks first New Glenn booster recovery after Mars payload deployment.
Storm strikes the Philippines and Vietnam, killing nearly 200.
Magnitude 6.3 quake in Balkh and Samangan provinces causes hundreds of casualties.
UN climate summit begins in Bel√©m, Brazil, centered on Amazon protection.
New Glenn first stage returns to flight readiness within ten days of landing.
$57B quarterly revenue fuels debate over AI bubble versus virtuous cycle of AI.
Google launches Gemini 3 Pro, claiming reasoning superiority over GPT-5.1.
Russia asserts capture of Kupiansk in Kharkiv region as Ukraine ammo stocks dwindle.
